title: Ticket #154: Move nightly tagging to pinguino
description: There is no particular rush to do this, except for if the repository ends up living on pinguino instead of in AFS, localizing the tagging will be required.
remarks:
2009-Dec-27 18:10:14 by matt:
The current plans mean tagging can happen anywhere, on AFS. This isn't very important anymore.
